entry.title: Ukraine Mounts Counteroffensive to Drive Russians Back From Kyiv, Key Cities
entry.content: Kyiv’s forces appeared to counterattack in the outlying towns of Irpin, Bucha and Hostomel, while Ukraine said it carried out an airstrike on the Kherson airport, which is now a Russian air base.

entry.title: A Ukrainian Town Deals Russia One of the War's Most Decisive Routs
entry.content: In the two-day battle of Voznesensk, local volunteers and the military repelled the invaders, who fled leaving behind armor and dead soldiers. ‘They had no orders for what to do if they are defeated.’

entry.title: Western Companies' Pullback From Russia Marks End of an Era
entry.content: Businesses flocked to the former Soviet Union in its lurch to capitalism, but the relationship was never easy. The Ukraine invasion has brought it all to a crashing halt.

entry.title: Nearly 1 Million Child Refugees Have Fled Ukraine for Poland
entry.content: Psychologists are working with refugees, leaving no appointments for locals, and government housing for needy Poles is now occupied by Ukrainians.
